#summary MORootViewController Overview

= Introduction =

Add your content here.


= Configuration Options =

=== Required ===

*entityName: * The name of the Entity to be displayed in the controller as a string

*controllerTitle: * Text to display as navigationItem.title and on the tabBarItem as follows:

{{{ 
self.navigationItem.title = self.controllerTitle; 
}}}

{{{ 
UITabBarItem* theItem = [[UITabBarItem alloc] initWithTitle:self.controllerTitle image:nil tag:0];
			self.tabBarItem = theItem;
			[theItem release]; 
}}}

*sortKeyPaths: * Array of keys or keyPaths to sort the entities by.  At least 1 is required.
  These are converted into NSSortDescriptors using:

{{{ 
NSSortDescriptor *sort = [[NSSortDescriptor alloc] initWithKey:sortKey ascending:YES selector:@selector(caseInsensitiveCompare:)]; 
}}}


*sectionIndexTitlesEnabled: *

*sectionIndexTitlesAlphabetical: *

*cellTextLabelKeyPath: *

*cellDetailTextLabelKeyPath: *

*detailViewPropertyListFile: *

=== Optional ===

*sectionKeyPath: * key or keyPath to use to create sections in the tableView
